Translations.Text: Koly vona rodyla yoho, vona izolyuvala sebe do faraway mistsya
protses narodzhennya prybuv yiy korpusom dereva palʹmy. Vona skazala," (ya soromlyusya tak;) ya by khotiv, shchob ya buv mertvyy pered tym, yak tse vidbulosya, ta povnistyu zabute
(nemovlya) zaklykav yiyi z vnyzu yiyi, kazhuchy, "Ne sumuyutʹ. Vash Lord zabezpechyv vas z potokom
Yakshcho vy trusyte korpus tsʹoho dereva palʹmy, tse upustytʹ zrili stroky dlya vas
Hostyatʹsya ta napiy, ta tishatʹsya. Koly vy dyvytesʹ budʹ khto, kazhete, `i zrobyly vow tyshi; YA ne rozmovlyayu sʹohodni do budʹ khto
Vona prybula yiy rodyna, perenesennya yo. Vony skazaly, "O Mary, vy zdiysnyly shchosʹ tse povnistyu nespodivano
O nashchadok Aaron, vash batʹko buv ne pohana lyudyna, ne bula vasha maty unchaste
Vona pointed yomu. Vony skazaly, "Yak my mozhemo rozmovlyaty z nemovlya u crib
(nemovlya rozmovlyalo ta) skazav, "ya ye sluzhbovetsʹ BOHA. Vin dav meni svyate pysannya, ta pryznachylo meni prorok
Vin zrobyv meni blahoslovennyy de zavhodno ya idu, ta nakazanyy meni shchob zauvazhyty Kontaktni Molytvy (Salat) ta obov'yazkova dobrodiynistʹ (Zakat) dlya takoho dovhoho yak ya zhyvoho
ya mushu chestʹ moya maty; Vin ne zrobyv meni nepokirnyy buntivnyk
Ta myr budu na meni denʹ ya narodyvsya, denʹ ya vmyrayu, ta denʹ ya pryyizhdzhayu resurrected
Tse buv Isus, syn Mary, ta tse yavlyaye soboyu pravdu tsiyeyi materiyi, pro kotru vony prodovzhuyutʹsya maty sumniv
Tse ne befit BOH shcho Vin begets syn, Vin glorified. Shchob budʹ shcho zrobyv, Vin prosto kazhe yomu,," ta tse
Vin takozh proholosyv, "BOH miy Lord ta vash Lord; vy budete obozhnyuvaty Yoho yedynyy. Tse yavlyaye soboyu pravo shlyakh
riznomanitni storony posperechalysya sered sebe (vidnosno identychnosti Isusa). Tomu, prykroshchi do tsykh khto disbelieve z vydovyshcha strashnoho dnya
Chekayete do vy chuyete yikh ta bachyte yikh koly vony prybuvayutʹ zustrichatysya z namy. Porushnyky na shcho denʹ bude povnistyu hubytysya
Poperedzhayutʹ yikh pro denʹ remorse, koly vyrok bude vydavatysya. Vony ye povnistyu oblivious; vony ne vvazhayutʹ
My yavlyayemo soboyu khto uspadkovuyemo zemlyu ta kozhnoho na tse; do nas kozhnyy bude vertatysya
Z·haduyutʹ u svyatomu pysanni Abraham; vin buv svyatyy, prorok
Vin skazav yoho batʹkovi, "O miy batʹko, chomu vy obozhnyuyete shcho mozhete ni chuyete, ni dyvytesʹ, ne dopomahayete vam u budʹ-yakomu shlyakhu
O miy batʹko, ya otrymav pevne znannya shcho vy ne otrymaly. Proslidkuyte meni, ta ya budu keruvaty vamy u pryamomu shlyakhu
O miy batʹko, ne obozhnyuyutʹ chorta. Chort protydiyav naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvomu
O miy batʹko, ya bo lest vy zaznayete retribution z naybilʹshoho Dobrozychlyvoho, todi stavaly soyuznykom chorta
Vin skazav, vy forsaken moyi bohy, O Abraham? Yakshcho ne vy zupynyayete, ya budu kam'yani vy. Lyshitʹ meni yedynyy
Vin skazav, "Myr budete na vas. YA budu blahaty moho Lorda prostyty vas; Vin Naybilʹsh Riznovyd do meni
ya pokynu vas ta bohiv vy obozhnyuyete bilya BOHA. YA budu obozhnyuvaty tilʹky moho Lorda. Blahayuchy moho Lorda vyklyuchno, ya ne mozhu poyikhaty nepravylʹnyy
Tomu, shcho vin pokynuv yikh ta bohiv vony obozhnyuvaly bilya BOHA, my harantuvaly yomu Isaac ta Jacob, ta my zrobyly kozhni z nykh prorok
My showered yim z nashym myloserdyam, ta my harantuvaly yim pochesnu pozytsiyu u istoriyi
Z·haduyutʹ u svyatomu pysanni Moses. Vin buv prysvyachenyy, ta vin buv prorok kur'yera
My zaklykaly yoho z prava storona Pidiymayemosʹ Sinai. My prynesly yomu blyzʹko, shchob prysudyty z nym
Ta my harantuvaly yomu, z nashoho myloserdya, yoho brata Aaron yak prorok
Ta z·haduyutʹ u svyatomu pysanni Ismail. Vin buv pravdyvyy koly vin poobitsyav, ta vin buv prorok kur'yera
Vin zvychayno nakazuvav yoho rodynu zauvazhyty Kontaktni Molytvy (Salat) ta obov'yazkova dobrodiynistʹ (Zakat); vin buv pryynyatnyy do yoho Lorda
Ta z·haduyutʹ u svyatomu pysanni Idris. Vin buv svyatyy, prorok
My pidnyaly yoho do pochesnoho rozryadu

deyako z prorokiv komu BOHA blahoslovlyaye. Vony buly vybrani z chysla nashchadkiv Adam, ta nashchadky tsykh komu my perevezly z Noah, ta nashchadky Abraham ta Izrayilʹ, ta z chysla tsykh komu my kerovanykh ta obranykh. Koly apokalipsys naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvoho deklamuyutʹsya yim, vony padayutʹ prostrate, weeping
